thread.title: Deutsche Bank Lesson: Time for Banks to Go Goodwill Hunting
thread.title_full: Deutsche Bank Lesson: Time for Banks to Go Goodwill Hunting - WSJ

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Deutsche Bank Lesson: Time for Banks to Go Goodwill Hunting
text:
Time to â€˜fess up. Banks pursued a lot of ambitious, empire-building deals in the glory days of the late 1990s and 2000s. It was the era of the universal bank and everyone wanted in, especially after the repeal of the Glass-Steagall Act in the U.S.
The financial crisis put an end to that. It also threw into doubt the wisdom of that business model... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
